Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: aasamaan aur raat ko aane vaale kee qasam
aur tumako kya maaloom raat ko aane vaala kya hai
(vah) chamakata hua taara hai
(is baat kee qasam) ki koee shakhsh aisa nahin jis par nigehabaan muqarrar nahin
to insaan ko dekhana chaahie ki vah kis cheez se paida hua hain
vah uchhalate hue paanee (manee) se paida hua hai
jo peeth aur seene kee haddiyon ke beech mein se nikalata hai
beshak khuda usake dobaara (paida) karane par zaroor kudarat rakhata hai
jis din dilon ke bhed jaanche jaenge
to (us din) usaka na kuchh zor chalega aur na koee madadagaar hoga
chakkar (khaane) vaale aasamaan kee qasam
aur phatane vaalee (zameen kee qasam)
beshak ye quraan qaule faisal hai
aur lago nahin hai
beshak ye kuphfaar apanee tadabeer kar rahe hain
aur main apanee tadbeer kar raha hoon
to kaafiron ko mohalat do bas unako thodee see mohalat do
ai rasool apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar ke naam kee tasbeeh karo
jisane (har cheez ko) paida kiya
aur duroost kiya aur jisane (usaka) andaaza muqarrar kiya phir raah bataayee
aur jisane (haivaanaat ke lie) chaara ugaaya
phir khushk use siyaah rang ka kooda kar diya
ham tumhen (aisa) padha denge ki kabhee bhoolo hee nahin
magar jo khuda chaahe (mansookh kar de) beshak vah khulee baat ko bhee jaanata hai aur chhupe hue ko bhee
aur ham tumako aasaan tareeke kee taufeeq denge
to jahaan tak samajhaana mufeed ho samajhate raho
jo khauph rakhata ho vah to phauree samajh jaega
aur badabakht usase pahaloo tahee karega
jo (qayaamat mein) badee (tez) aag mein daakhil hoga
phir na vahaan marega hee na jeeyega
vah yaqeenan muraad dilee ko pahuncha jo (shirk se) paak ho
aur apane paravaradigaar ka zikr karata aur namaaz padhata raha
